activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2402
activity.text:
@gigincg @cp-Coder test failed

![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321721-f53953cf-9ccc-4bf6-aff0-ad067fd63402.jpg)

- username and password box is coloured with a blue line
- login button is having a black border

![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321908-f2f6aa2f-3b2c-43cc-be6c-70b493d7298d.jpg)

- the notification tab is having by default a black border

![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321999-07a0ccff-b549-4355-bc72-aa75f7cb18c3.jpg)

- it is hard to view the facility and the patients button in the facility page.

![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322147-3be093c6-57a3-4530-8d2b-27bdbebb62c1.jpg)

- in the facility detail page, all the buttons are having black borders, which is not looking good in the UI
- the separation by a line for the information on oxygen, bed capacity, doctors list, and corona triage is missing

![5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322260-5177d99d-320b-45a6-91a5-40cca57d74ed.jpg)

- all the heading and the cards are overlapping to each other

![6](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322350-1e8feb20-5489-4a17-86f7-42dd72f76577.jpg)

- in the assets, there is no lines present to separate them.
- the search box and all the buttons are having black border

![7](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322482-22c48ae7-dbfa-479b-a2e0-dd2b722efb7e.jpg)

- the search by name box size is high and overlapping with the button
- live and discharge button is not working smoothly, and the colour of the button is blue with live and dischage
- there is no line separating the patient names
- the add details of a patient button is having black border
- download live list and download all patient buttons having a border would look good.

![8](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322731-7667775f-0295-4300-8691-20e86d0afa59.jpg)

- all the buttons are having black border
- all the user cards are assembles in vertical, and there is a lot of white space been wasted on the right side

![9](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322909-19a0c85d-8561-485a-938b-742e4dbc7e4e.jpg)

- the active, completed, list view and filters buttons are not looking good
- the datas in the shifting cards look scrambled
- patient name box is having higher space and black border
- all details button is having black border

![10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323031-92977ba2-e830-4a10-9e32-40755a63a758.jpg)

- the black border is present for the back button and referral letter
- Details of the patient are looking scrambled, a change of UI will be better

![11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323201-119d776f-6eea-40e0-925b-54b2655541fd.jpg)

- doctor video, create investigation and all the buttons are having black border
- when we are clicking the update, summary, etc... button, they are not showing any indication that it is been selected.
- in the nursing analysis, all the cards are overlapping.

![12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323451-373aaadd-ae35-4f02-817c-684b2dfe3bdd.jpg)

- in the IO Balance plot, intake and output are having black border
- all the graphs are not having any borders

![13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323612-c65d8fa3-7fc8-40bf-bc04-88bc0317c90f.jpg)

- all the boxes having the black border
- the boxes are overlapping
- the boxes are over sized
